description: This file defines a React component called Sidebar, which renders a navigational sidebar with links to different sections of a web application, including internal navigation links and an external link to API documentation.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a navigation link, highlighting it if the current pathname matches its href.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the entire sidebar with navigation and external links.
